quotes.quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
The ache for home lives in all of us. The safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies.
One had to build shelters. One had to make pockets and live inside them.
We must protect and share the world.
He that accepts protection, stipulates obedience.
The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
You must be willing to protect yourself and what you cherish, no matter what the cost.
Be good to others, that will protect you against evil.
The great can protect themselves, but the poor and humble require the arm and shield of the law.
A strong egoism is a protection.
Protect those who protect you.
Don't be so defensive and afraid to be proven wrong that you miss the opportunity to learn from your mistakes.
Safeguarding the rights of others is the most noble and beautiful end of a human being.
The property of power is to protect.
People are far more protective [of women] instinctively.
Although being possessive and protective can be cute, but don't go overboard with.
You can do as much diligence as possible before you go somewhere to try to protect yourself and the people around you.
Protection of private property is a fundamental right protected in a strong democracy.
A blessing is a circle of light drawn around a person to protect, heal and strengthen.
Being protective is important.
Standing on the defensive indicates insufficient strength; attacking, a superabundance of strength.
The defensive power of a pinned piece is only imaginary.
Protection is not a principle but an expedient.
You do not adequately protect yourself by being half awake when other are sleeping.
When you feel protective toward your parents, you have become an adult.
If you hold yourself dear, protect yourself well.
Silence is a protective coating over pain.
The purely defensive is doomed to defeat.
A covenant made with God should be regarded not as restrictive but as protective.
